name: RandomColor
0:
”Alexa open Random Color”
”tell me a color”
”give me a color”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: random color
des: This skill will generate a random color for you. It will give you the name of the color, the HEX value, as well as the RGB value.
priv: The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
